title: a
text: a policy specifying whether whitelisting or blacklisting is to be implemented is specified

title: b
text: the software allowed to execute under whitelisting or denied use under blacklisting is specified

title: c
text: whitelisting to allow the execution of authorized software or blacklisting to prevent the use of unauthorized software is implemented as specified

title: a
text: a policy for controlling the installation of software by users is established

title: b
text: installation of software by users is controlled based on the established policy

title: c
text: installation of software by users is monitored

title: a
text: system users are identified

title: b
text: processes acting on behalf of users are identified

title: c
text: devices accessing the system are identified

title: a
text: the identity of each user is authenticated or verified as a prerequisite to system access

title: b
text: the identity of each process acting on behalf of a user is authenticated or verified as a prerequisite to system access

title: c
text: the identity of each device accessing or connecting to the system is authenticated or verified as a prerequisite to system access

title: a
text: privileged accounts are identified

title: b
text: multifactor authentication is implemented for local access to privileged accounts

title: c
text: multifactor authentication is implemented for network access to privileged accounts

title: d
text: multifactor authentication is implemented for network access to non-privileged accounts

title: a
text: replay-resistant authentication mechanisms are implemented for network account access to privileged and non-privileged accounts

title: a
text: a period within which identifiers cannot be reused is defined

title: b
text: reuse of identifiers is prevented within the defined period

title: a
text: a period of inactivity after which an identifier is disabled is defined

title: b
text: identifiers are disabled after the defined period of inactivity

title: a
text: password complexity requirements are defined

title: b
text: password change of character requirements are defined

title: c
text: minimum password complexity requirements as defined are enforced when new passwords are created

title: d
text: minimum password change of character requirements as defined are enforced when new passwords are created

title: a
text: the number of generations during which a password cannot be reused is specified

title: b
text: reuse of passwords is prohibited during the specified number of generations

title: a
text: an immediate change to a permanent password is required when a temporary password is used for system logon

title: a
text: passwords are cryptographically protected in storage

title: b
text: passwords are cryptographically protected in storage

title: a
text: authentication mechanisms are regularly reviewed and updated

title: b
text: authentication mechanisms are tested for effectiveness

title: c
text: authentication mechanisms are monitored for unauthorized access attempts
